name: SLASH (XenoRocket)
description:
A turn based 2 player game.

Each turn, only one of the players can use their sword.

Currently, there are only three arenas to fight in. There will be more in future updates. Other modes like co-op are planned.

CONTROLS:

Player 1 - WASD to move, F to attack.

Player 2 - ARROW KEYS to move, M to attack.
